version_description:
There are now six additional cookbooks, each with at least 60 recipes, available as in-app purchases:

- Vegetarian
- Tapas
- Family Recipes
- Grilling (72 recipes)
- Simple & Delicious
- Christmas

Do you already have one of our separate photo cookbook apps? Don't worry, this will be automatically recognized and the related topics will be unlocked in this app if they're installed on the same device.

A completely new user interface is waiting for you on the iPhone, optimized for portrait orientation and all display sizes.  

All images are now in Retina resolution.

The app now fully supports iOS 10 and future iOS versions.

Improved the detection of previously purchased apps. 

Do you already have one of our separate photo cookbook apps? Don’t worry, this will be automatically recognized and the related topics will be unlocked in this app if they’re installed on the same device.
You can now enable push notifications to receive seasonal recipe suggestions and other cooking inspirations from our team.
This version adds support for iOS 12.
Added support for 11-inch iPad Pro and 12.9-inch iPad Pro (3rd generation).
Improved support for iOS 14 and the latest devices.
This update fixes a display error on iOS 7.
